text: konege atana (saradarana) balige hogi avaru (sahodararu) helidaru; saradarare, namage hagu nam'ma parivarakke sankata tattide. Navu nikrsta bandavaladondige nim'ma balige bandiddeve. Nivu namage purna palannu kodiri mattu namage danavannu nidiri. Khanditavagiyu allahanu danigalige pratiphalavannu niduvanu
